title.rendered: Member Update: RoboForex Adds ETH/BTC and LTC/BTC to its Crypto Offering

content.rendered:
Approved member of the Financial Commission – RoboForex is expanding the list of cryptocurrency pairs available for trading by adding ETH / BTC and LTC / BTC. Also, the broker significantly improved its trading conditions for Pro-Standard and ECN accounts.

Until today, RoboForex provided its clients with the opportunity to trade only crypto/fiat pairs via its MetaTrader 4 and MetaTrader 5 trading platforms, providing BTC / USD, ETH / USD, XRP / USD, LTC / USD, BCH / USD, EOS / USD, BTC / EUR and ETH / EUR. Now broker adds 2 new purely crypto pairs: ETH / BTC and LTC / BTC. These tools are already available in MT4 and MT5 terminals.

In addition to expanding the list of assets available for trading, Roboforex has significantly improved its trading conditions for clients using Pro-Standard and ECN accounts. The broker reduced spreads for clients trading cryptocurrencies on the Pro-Standard accounts and cut the commission 1.5 times for those trading crypto assets on ECN accounts.

Denis Golomedov, Chief Marketing Officer at RoboForex, comments on the innovations: “We’ve added new instruments, which our clients wanted so much. Like I said earlier, a considerable part of them trade cryptocurrencies and we believe this area has great potential. To make our services more comfortable and attractive to clients, we’ve also improved conditions for trading cryptocurrencies for some of our account types, where we’ve decreased spreads and commissions. We’re not going to stop here and will consistently realize our plans involving new products and improvements in the interests of our clients.”
